title: What is the setting for App timer used for?
content: I was trying to find a setting that would help with notifications not showing up in a timely matter. Arlo, camera, My Q, August lock...etc. There seems to be a 1-2 min delay before I get notifications. I found the setting for App timer. But not sure what it does or if its related to what I am looking for.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
